text:
(light music)
- My name is Michal.
I'm a lead cloud infrastructure architect.

My journey started by
occasion through Canada,
actually for Amazon itself.

I started my career in
Amazon Fulfillment Technology
and two years ago, I joined AWS Proserve.

I joined as a Cloud
Infrastructure Architect,
then got promoted to senior role.
Cloud Infrastructure Architect team
works with direct customers, partners

and other Professional
Services Teams itself.
Our role is design and build architecture

which is catalyst for cloud
journey for the customers.

Cloud itself, there is
always everything changing

so we need to keep up
and this is something

which is the most exciting
and the most challenging
in the same way.
My greatest accomplishment is actually see

how the people I interview,
how successful they are
in their work.

This is something which makes
me feel proud of myself.
